basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HCV NS3 helicase protein)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.18479669]Hepatitis C virus (HCV):inhibition of HCV helicase activity(IC50=0.2±0.01 μM);West Nile virus (WNV):inhibition of WNV helicase activity(IC50=2.7±0.3 μM);Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of JEV helicase activity(IC50=21.1±2.2 μM).
